data.name: Castle Craft
data.detailed_description:
About

Castle Craft is a game where players can build huge castles in an ancient wartorn world and must defend them against hordes of enemies in siege battles of epic proportions. Castle Craft is a unique blend of the voxel sandbox genre, action, and tower defense.


Key Features

  • Plan and construct your unique castle, a bulwark against the dark forces threatening the kingdom
  • Launch a flourishing artisan economy within your castle walls and on the surrounding fields
  • Raise an army of brave defenders
  • Defend your castle against waves of enemies of increasing size and military capacity
  • Inspired by evolution in biology, enemies mutate and the more successful ones will be more numerous in the next wave. This lets the enemy army adapt to your defenses.
  • The world is fully destructible: siege projectiles tear holes in your building, giants will crush your castle doors, and magic will raise volcanos or open up canyons swallowing entire groups of enemies

Build Efficiently

You are the lord of the castle and do not need to build every block individually. Nor do you mine the necessary resources yourself. Instead, you can count on the help of your artisans to help you create a flourishing economy. This facilitates the process of creating impressive structures.

Build With a Purpose

Your work will be put to the test. Ever growing waves or enemies will probe your defenses and lay siege to your castle. You can either join the battle yourself or focus on coordinating your forces.

Determine Your Fate

Will you invest your resources into improved castle structures, a larger defending force, or your own character? Your choice will determine the course of your campaign to expand and defend your kingdom.

Contribute to a Growing World

Castle Craft will provide tools to easily extend and modify the game to your liking. You will be able to create new monsters, new kingdoms, new castle elements and even new campaigns yourself and share them with the community.


The Grim World of Castle Craft

Found under the primordial skies above the icy wastelands in the north by a scouting party, you were brought south, adopted, and raised in Valusia. When the capitol was razed to the ground, you were on your own again. With no guidance and no goal, you ended up in the infamous Oxgardian prison after a drunken bar fight.


Through an unlikely mixup, king Debimius makes you the head of his army and rebuilding efforts, instead of executing you. Will you, a drunkard and good-for-nothing, be up to the challenge? Were you just lucky, or did someone pull the strings in the background? And will you be able to help the population of Valusia flourish, despite the arrogance and incompetence of their - and your - king?

You better - no one else is standing between the people of Valusia and the rising Old Gods in the Wastes of Hastur, the land of ash-gray skies and black stars.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6400 / AMD X8 FX-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 6650 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
